EmailTemplate.name: Beta release Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Global-FoundryView Beta Release Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Thank you for participating in Global-FoundryView beta release. We would like to get your feedback on your most recent online experience. Please take about 5 minutes to complete our short online survey. Beta release survey
If you face any technical difficulties, please contact:
lewis.leong@globalfoundries.com
Thanks in advance! Global-FoundryView Team
